name: Ancient Parthan Defenders
flavorText: These bracers were first worn in the distant past by members of the Partha Guard. Though musty from age, they retain power that has protected the city for centuries.
flavorTextHtml: These bracers were first worn in the distant past by members of the Partha Guard. Though musty from age, they retain power that has protected the city for centuries.

secondary.textHtml: Each stunned enemy within 25 yards reduces your damage taken by 9%. [9 - 12]%
secondary.text: Each stunned enemy within 25 yards reduces your damage taken by 9%. [9 - 12]%
